content: FYI our "company" page has some limitations in how we can describe ourselves. I'm going to call us a "nonprofit" as a best fit for now, but if that representation of the project were to cause any problems with any involved parties, please let me know. I should be able to change things after the fact
https://www.linkedin.com/company/projectpythia it's live! I'm going to be doing some setup and admin bits today
@Brian Rose I think our official grant news release would be a great first major post for the linkedin page; be sure to drop a link here when that goes up!
